title: Keanu Reeves voices archvillain Shadow in Sonic 3 trailer
content:
Ben Schwartz voices the titular character in Sonic the Hedgehog 3.

Some lucky folks got a heads-up last week that a trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog 3Â  was about to drop when Paramount Pictures released a playable Sega Genesis gaming cartridge to select individuals. Hidden among a mini-game and character posters, and accessible by entering a cheat code, was the trailer release date. True to its word, Paramount just dropped the final trailer for the third film in the successful franchise. All our favorite characters are back, as well as a couple of new ones, most notably a new villain familiar to fans of the games: Shadow, voiced by Keanu Reeves.

(Spoilers for the first two films below.)

As previously reported, in the first film, Sonic (Ben Schwartz) teamed up with local town sheriff Tom Wachowski (James Marsden) to stop the sinister mad scientist Dr. Robotnik (Jim Carrey). Robotnik wanted to catch and experiment on the hedgehog, and if he could also frame Tom as a domestic terrorist, even better.
